abstract: Blackstone Group, the Apollo Group and Colony Capital are said to be eyeing the German bank WestLB’s real estate finance unit, The Financial Times Deutschland reported.
snippet: Blackstone Group, the Apollo Group and Colony Capital are said to be eyeing the German bank WestLB’s real estate finance unit, The Financial Times Deutschland reported.
lead_paragraph: The Blackstone Group, the Apollo Group and Colony Capital are said to be considering the purchase of  WestLB‘s real estate finance unit, The Financial Times Deutschland reported.

headline.main: Buyout Shops Said to Considers WestLB Unit
